description:
Conan and his friends meet Kitami Saya and Shono Kyona, two actresses competing for popularity on their blogs, at a hotel. Kyona, whose blog features Saya`s secret, is found murdered in her locked hotel room. Based on the conditions at the crime scene and Saya`s actions, Conan believes she is the murderer. Conan gets Saya`s story in room 504 and determines how she entered Kyona`s room and the murder weapon. Later, Conan checks Kyona`s blog again and discovers Saya`s secret. A conversation between his friends helps him realize the secret behind the locked room...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Meurtre à huis clos de l’actrice blogueuse (2e partie)
The Actress Blogger`s Locked Room Case (Part 2)
قضية الغرفة المغلقة للممثلة صاحبة المدونة (الجزء الثاني)
ブログ女優の密室事件 (後編)
